content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Electricity generator at position(-1.5, 4.5)
Consists of 
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 1.5)
- Steam engine at position(-1.5, 4.5)
- Pipe group connecting offshore pump to boiler and boiler to steam engine

#### Coal mine at position(15.5, -0.5)
Consists of 
- Electric mining drill at position(15.5, -0.5)
- Wooden chest at position(15.5, 1.5) to collect coal
- Small electric poles connecting steam engine to electric mining drill

### ERROR TIPS
- Errors when placing entities too far away from the player position
  - Make sure to move to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum distance allowed is 10 units.
- Errors when electric mining drill is not receiving electricity
  - Ensure that the electric mining drill is connected to a power source and that the power source is functioning.
- Errors when boiler is out of fuel
  - Ensure that the boiler is supplied with fuel (e.g., coal) to continue functioning.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
